name: Pipe Cube
description:
Get the ball to the end of the level.

Select pipe pieces with left mouse button.

Rotate pipe pieces with Q E W S A and D. It may take some experimenting as the rotation mechanic we wanted didn't get implemented in time.

Press Space to release the ball.

R to reset the ball.

P to reset the level.

Linux and Mac versions untested.

Just two very basic levels.
